simsigcompanion-desc: The description of the extension. It will be displayed on Special:Version.
mysimsig-updated: Success message for [[Special:MySimSig]] after saving changes displayed at the top of the page.
mysimsig-pageheader: Paragraph of text explaining the purpose and functionality of [[Special:MySimSig]] shown ahove the form.
mysimsig-form-submit: Button text for submitting the form on [[Special:MySimSig]].
mysimsig-table-header-simulations: A table header, data items below are names of simulations which are directly extracted from the software product SimSig and displayed in the table rows.
mysimsig-table-header-owned: A table header above a checkbox, asking whether the user owns the specific license to the simulations of the software product.
mysimsig-error-nosims: An error message spanning the table if the wiki is not configured with any selectable simulations, asking the user to contact an administrator.
simsigcomm-table-header-simulations: A table header, data items below are names of simulations which are directly extracted from the software product SimSig and displayed in the table rows.
simsigcomm-table-header-owners: A table header, column shows a list of users who have stated they own a license to the simulations of the software product through [[Special:MySimSig]].
simsigcomm-error-nosims: An error message spanning the table if no users have selected any simulations to be displayed on the community page via [[Special:MySimSig]].
simsigcomm-message-noowners: A notice that no users currently own any of the simulations.
simsigcomm-pageheader: Paragraph of text explaining how the special page works, data is largely extracted from inputs on [[Special:MySimSig]].
simsigcomm-message-freesims: A message box, the parameter is a comma-separated list of individual simulations that do not require a license, displayed at the bottom of the page.
